text: Edward king gret Harold <erl> & Aylnod abbot & Godwine & ealle mine þeynes on Sumerseten frendliche.

Ich queþe eou þæt ich wille þæt Gyse bissop beo þisses bissopriches wrthe heer inne mid eou and alch þare þinge þas þe þar mid richte to gebyrað binnan porte & butan mid saca & mid socna swo uol & swo vorð swo hit eni bissop him touoren formest hauede on ealle þing.
And ich bidde eou alle þat ge him beon on fultome Cristendom <to> spekene loc whar hit þarf sy & eower fultumes beþurfe eal swo ich getrowwen <to> eow habben þat ge him on fultume beon willen.
And gif what sy mid unlage out of þan bissopriche geydon sy hit on londe oþer an oððer þinge þat fulstan him vor minan luuen þæt hit in ongeyn cume swo swo ge for Gode witen þat hit richt sy.
